评论详情: I only buy Wacoal bras because of the superb fit & quality. Especially for us big busted women, the support is wonderful.
I love Wacoal bras and this is my new favorite.

评论概述: Cup size is a bit it off
评论详情: The quality seems really nice. The cup size was a little larger than other brands of the same size. I have returned and ordered the next cup size down.
I ordered my normal size of 34 DDD and it fits perfectly. Very comfortable. I don’t find the fabric itchy at all. I’m very happy with the purchase.

Finding a bra that is beautiful, well made( awesome quality) and actually provides support...is a rarity. Every bra I've purchased from this company NEVER disappoints! I'm a VERY busty woman. My bras can not be found in stores in my size. I love that this company provides so many options for style and colors. Most of my bras only came in white, nude or black. Highly depressing and basic. Now I have an array of colors and styles. Makes my heart full of joy! These bras are not inexpensive but I've tried other companies. They don't compare to Wacoal. I literally have the perfect. I recommend this company whether you are busty or not. Fantastic lingerie. Spend the money and be ready to be impressed. Also they have sales regularly on their site and Amazon. Thanks!
Very beautiful and comfortable bra.  The size matches.  I am very pleased!

评论概述: Too much coverage and too wide
评论详情: Fabric feels ok. Pretty lace design. Cups are too separate for me and too far back on the side. Projection is good but it's a tad loose at the top near the strap. Gore is flat and feels comfortable. Shape mismatch. Gonna have to pass on this one.

This is lightweight, but it is made extremely well. The back stays in place. It is easy to wash by hand, and it drys quickly. I appreciate the price since I had paid the retail price for one in a store.
I love this brand, this style is one of my favorites. Very comfortable and true to size and the pink is really pretty

评论概述: Good bra, but very stretchy  bandeau
评论详情: I wear this brand because I have narrow shoulders, and the bra straps stay put because of the way they're situated on the bra. I got my usual size, but this one is very stretchy and I find myself on the tightest hooks rather than loosest.

Perfect fit, but so itchy I couldn’t wear it. When will you make this in a smooth fabric??  This fit perfectly but cannot possibly be worn. So disappointing for those of us who’ve been searching for the perfect fit.
I absolutely love this brand of bra and panties. I buy them exclusively. Not only are they cute and even sexy, but they’re extremely comfortable
I'm a hard to fit 40G! I've tried a million bras. This bra fits perfectly, is comfortable AND beautiful. Nice job Wacola 👍
Expensive but lifts and shapes nicely. This is not smooth under clothing.

Finally!...A bra that’s actually pretty for larger busts! This bra is unlined so doesn’t add extra weight to my boobs and the lace is so pretty! It sits flat across my chest and the underwire provides slight lift which is great for support. Also, provides great coverage, finally I can bend over without breast spillage! The lace is slightly stiff, however very thin, so unlike most lace bras, you the lace is almost seamless under shirts. It is however, seamed, so that’s the part you can see under t-shirts or button downs, but it’s not too bad. True to size chart. The bra is so comfortable that I forget I'm wearing it! I've washed this a dozen or so times(in a lingerie bag, air dry) and it is holding up beautifully!

I was skeptical - but this is *the* bra I have been looking for. I am small framed (size 32 band size) with a large, heavy chest and need definite lift and separation.  Also wanted something well-made, but minimalist looking and without padding. This hits every note! I almost subtracted a star because it *is* pricey....however, when you're a hard-to-fit size and something (finally) rings your bell, you become quite forgiving! For what it may be worth to you to judge sizing, I am 5'3" 128 pounds and bought the 32DDD.
